uk.ac.cam.quebec.wikiwrapper

Class WikiArticle

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.quebec.wikiwrapper.WikiArticle

  • public abstract class WikiArticle
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a single Wikipedia article
    Author:
    Stuart

    • Constructor Detail

      • WikiArticle

        public WikiArticle(java.lang.String title)
            throws WikiException
        Constructor for an article. For performance reasons only the extract is gathered on initialisation.
        Parameters:
        title - The correct title for the article
        Throws:
        WikiException - Throws exception if connection fails

    • Method Detail

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()

      • getExtract

        public java.lang.String getExtract()

      • getViews

        public abstract int getViews()
                      throws WikiException
        Method to get usage data for a page. Is gathered on first call so there is likely to be a performance hit then. The data is monthly not daily so it may not be that useful and perhaps better to rely on search.
        Returns:
        The number of views of the page in the past 30 days.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Throws exception if connection fails

      • getURL

        public abstract java.lang.String getURL()
        Forms the URL of the page.
        Returns:
        URL as a string

      • getEdits

        public abstract java.util.List<WikiEdit> getEdits(int editCount)
                                           throws WikiException
        Method to get the edits list. If the editCount is less than or equal to the current length of the edit list then there is no call to Wikipeda and the cached list is returned. However if it is greater than then the entire edit list will be rebuilt (costly).
        Parameters:
        editCount - Number of edits wanted
        Returns:
        List of the edits
        Throws:
        WikiException - Throws exception if connection fails

      • getCachedEdits

        public abstract java.util.List<WikiEdit> getCachedEdits()
        Method that return the list of edits already gathered. Will never make a web query.
        Returns:
        List of the edits.

      • clearCachedEdits

        public abstract void clearCachedEdits()
        Removes all cached edits
